T02D2712:79a-3: 'phags pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi bstod pa //
T02D2712:79a-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2712:79a-5: sdigs mdzub gdong bstan pa yis //
T02D2712:79a-6: ri rab lhun po du ma g-yos //
T02D2712:79a-7: ma lus rgya mtsho chen po'i chu//
T02D2712:79a-8: sen me'i rtse mos gyen du blangs //
T02D2712:79a-9: nam mkha' mu med pa yi khams //
T02D2712:79a-10: zhabs kyi gom pa gcig gis mnan //
T02D2712:79a-11: zad pa'i dus kyi me 'bar ba //
T02D2712:79a-12: zhal gyi dbugs kyis btab pas bcil //
T02D2712:79a-13: dus mtshungs sku yi cha gcig la //
T02D2712:79a-14: chu dang me yi char phab pa //
T02D2712:79a-15: la lar zad par sangs rgyas su //
T02D2712:79a-16: gyur nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
T02D2712:79a-17: la lar nyon mongs ma lus pa //
T02D2712:79a-18: nub pas zhi ba'i de nyid ston //
T02D2712:79a-19: dal bas dbang po bde sogs kyi //
T02D2712:79a-20: gdong la rnam par gzigs pa'i spyan //
T02D2712:79a-21: phyogs kyi 'khor los bkab pa yis //
T02D2712:79a-22: phyag mthil dmar po nyi ma rmugs //
T02D2712:79a-23: la lar lha ma yin gyi dpal //
T02D2712:79a-24: mthu gyur dam par gyur pa 'dzin //
T02D2712:79a-25: khyim pa dang ni brtul zhugs pa //
T02D2712:79a-26: changs spyod rtag tu ye shes can //
T02D2712:79a-27: byis pa'i gzugs can 'gro ba'i yab //
T02D2712:79a-29: mi 'jigs pa dang stobs mngal ba //
T02D2712:79a-30: thub pa'i gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa //
T02D2712:79a-31: phye ma mig sman dang mtshungs 'di //
T02D2712:79a-32: khyod la skyabs su rab tu mchi //
T02D2712:79a-33: nyon mongs bud shing ye shes me //
T02D2712:79a-34: du ma mtshon pa bgrang ba ltar //
T02D2712:79a-35: 'khor ba srid pa'i sbyor ba dang /
T02D2712:79a-36: mya ngan 'das la khyod mi gnas //
T02D2712:79a-37: mgon po rtag tu dbu ma mchog //
T02D2712:79a-38: yang dag brnyes pa ma lags sam //
T02D2712:79a-39: chu dang bcas pa'i snod rnams su //
T02D2712:79a-40: zla ba'i gzugs brnyan shar ba ltar //
T02D2712:79b-0: gcig @79b tu gdul bya g-yo ba'i yid //
T02D2712:79b-1: rnam pa mang po 'dra ba'i mtshan //
T02D2712:79b-2: nyid kyi bag chags yid gcig tu //
T02D2712:79b-3: ye shes grub pa'i gsal gyur pa //
T02D2712:79b-4: bka' drin don gnyer tshul gyis ni //
T02D2712:79b-5: chags pas khyod kyi zhabs drung lhung //
T02D2712:79b-7: phyogs kyi khongs su rnam spros pa //
T02D2712:79b-8: zla ba'i 'od zer gang gyur mnyam //
T02D2712:79b-9: byis pa'i gzugs can mdzes pa 'di //
T02D2712:79b-10: tshes gcig zla ba lta mnyes pa //
T02D2712:79b-11: khyod kyi spyod pa bzlog dka' bas //
T02D2712:79b-12: bdud kyi mthu rtsal 'joms pas ci //
T02D2712:79b-13: khyod kyi mtshan tsam dran pas ni //
T02D2712:79b-14: dmyal ba pa yi khrag dang zhag / med par skams pas dmyal ba pha'i //
T02D2712:79b-16: shes rab bral bas mdun du khyod //
T02D2712:79b-17: dran pa'i yul du gyur pas kyang //
T02D2712:79b-18: mkhas pa rnams kyang the tshom gyi //
T02D2712:79b-19: mdud pa dam pos 'ching bar byed //
T02D2712:79b-20: thams cad lta zhig skad cig tu //
T02D2712:79b-21: khyod kyi spyan zur gyis gzigs nas //
T02D2712:79b-22: rnga yab g-yob pa'i bzhad gad kyis //
T02D2712:79b-23: bsten pa'i dpal ldan nyid bdag gis //
T02D2712:79b-24: gdul bya padmo'i snod rnams la //
T02D2712:79b-26: mgon po sngon med nyi ma yi //
T02D2712:79b-27: rol pas nyin mtshan snang bar mdzad //
T02D2712:79b-28: don gsal mdzad pa'i gsungs gis ni //
T02D2712:79b-29: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs //
T02D2712:79b-30: stong pa nyid ni mngon sum star //
T02D2712:79b-31: gsung gi dbang phyug ston par mdzad //
T02D2712:79b-32: rnam par rtog las ma gtogs pa //
T02D2712:79b-33: 'khor ba zhes bya ci yang med //
T02D2712:79b-34: rnam rtog de dang bral bas na //
T02D2712:79b-35: khyod ni rab tu mya ngan 'das //
T02D2712:79b-36: khyod kyi yon tan cha brjod las //
T02D2712:79b-37: byung bas bsod nams 'phel ba yis //
T02D2712:79b-38: 'gro ba rnams ni khyod brjod pas //
T02D2712:79b-39: phun sum tshogs pa la gnas shog / bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi bstod pa /
T02D2712:79b-40: rtog ge pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2712:79b-42: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shraddh'a ka ra warma dang /
